description:
Duplicate applicaiton already approved. - ANA 5/9/16
Details of rainwater and/or greywater recycling systems pursuant to condition 22 of planning permission reference PP/2014/6303 dated 31/03/2015 Phase 5 for Variation of condition 3 of planning permission P/2012/0708 dated 13/08/2013 (subsequently amended by PP/2014/2142 dated 21/07/2014) to agree amendments to the strategic landscape plan, the tree retention and removal plans, and the building heights plan in relation to Phases 4 and 5 of the South Acton Estate  masterplan comprising Outline Planning Application (reserving Appearance;  Means of Access; Landscaping; Layout and Scale for later determination) for the continued regeneration of the South Acton Estate comprising of maximum of 2,350 residential units, a maximum of 1050sqm of flexible A1 (retail)/ A3 (restaurant and caf√©)/  B1 (office) / D1(community) uses, of which 600sqm is to be A1 (retail) use, a further 2348sqm of D1 (community)/ B1 (office) space (to include minimum 926sqm for provision of a community centre and youth club), energy centre, alterations to allotments, re-sited and enhanced open space and play facilities, landscaping , highway works and 1,128 car parking spaces (EIA Application) (See 164014CND for documents)
